participant_1.name: Aditi
participant_1.personality: Creative and family-oriented, with a hint of introspection and humor.
participant_1.background: I will do laundry and spend time with my family. I like candy and soda. I am an Indian-American wedding photographer. I am allergic to milk. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and adventurous, with a passion for learning and a knack for building things.
participant_2.background: I am not rich, but I am trying to learn Swedish because I love hockey and I want to be more comfortable in Sweden. I want to be a doctor when I graduate. I would brag about skiing down mountains despite my fear of heights. I grew up as an orphan. I like to build things.

content.text: I am an Indian-American photographer. I am allergic to milk, I love candy and soda, and I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met. What about you?

I am not rich, but I am trying to learn Swedish because I love hockey and I want to be more comfortable in Sweden. I would brag about skiing down mountains despite my fear of heights. I grew up as an orphan and I like to build things.
That's really cool. I have a friend who was born in Sweden and moved to the US when she was 12. She hates hockey. I'm not sure if it's because she's not from there or if she just doesn't like sports.
I'm not sure why I like hockey so much. I guess it's because I grew up playing it with my friends. I've always loved the speed and the physicality of the game.
I like the speed too. I'm not much of a sports person, but I can appreciate a good hockey game.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to play video games and watch movies. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
I love video games too! I'm not much of a movie person, but I do like to watch documentaries.
I'm not sure if I have a favorite video game, but I really like the Call of Duty series.
I've never played Call of Duty, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
I might have to check it out
